Issue.creator: denyeart
Issue.summary: Prune state data from a channelâ€™s ledger
Issue.description: Prune public and private keys from state database based on an application provided property (e.g. tag key with transaction year/month to enable later pruning state database by year/month). Trigger mass pruning based on a special transaction type (as opposed to normal chaincode deletes). Useful for append-only workloads, or where keys enter a final state. Can be used along with block pruning.
